body:
### Steps to reproduce

spack find --json does not include the hashes for the installed packages.

### Error message

_No response_

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.3-4506-a2c1635
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-nehalem
* **Concretizer:** clingo

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: Hashes are missing from "spack find --json"
